news.title: Disney earnings top expectations as streaming, parks offset TV headwinds
news.summary: Disney reported quarterly results Wednesday, posting earnings that topped expectations but revenue that came in just shy of analyst projections. Disney reported quarterly Results Wednesday.

news.title: Uber beats on revenue, announces $20 billion stock buyback
news.summary: Uber's revenue climbed 18% from a year earlier, topping analysts' estimates. Uber's CEO Travis Kalanick says the company will continue to focus on safety and security.

news.title: Trump views foreign investment pledges as gifts. Trade partners say that's way off the mark
news.summary: Foreign investment pledges are at the center of several major Trump trade deals. One question underpinning the pledges is how they might actually be enforced.

news.title: McDonald's sees U.S. sales rebound, but concerns about low-income consumers linger
news.summary: Shares of McDonald's have risen roughly 3% this year. The fast-food giant has a market cap of nearly $220 billion. The company's stock is up about 3% so far in 2014.

news.title: Musk says Tesla is training an upgraded Full Self-Driving model which could be released next month
news.summary: Elon Musk said the new Full Self-Driving model will have a larger parameter size and improved video performance. Elon Musk: The new Full self-driving car will be available by the end of the year.

news.title: A tech-driven growth boom will trump tariffs and trade wars
news.summary: The president's policies are stagflationary, but they cannot derail America’s dynamic private sector, writes Julian Zelizer. Zelizer: ‘The president’’ ‘I’m not worried about the economy,’ he says.

news.title: ‘Historical trends are no longer working.’ This strategist says retail investors are completely baffling Wall Street.
news.summary: Nationwide strategist Mark Hackett says the battle to control Wall Street is so far veering in favor of retail investors. Hackett: "I think we're going to see a lot more retail investors on Wall Street in the future"

news.title: Walt Disney leans hard into streaming as its future
news.summary: Disney announced earlier that it had reached a deal to sell 10% of ESPN to the NFL in exchange for the NFL’s media properties.

news.title: ‘I’m scared to lose’: I have $140K in a 401(k) and earn $45K a year. Can I retire in 20 years?
news.summary: “My 401(k) retirement planner shows I’ll likely be short $1,500 every month during my retirement.”

news.title: Bank of England on course for slowest ever pace of rate cuts. But without the abuse.
news.summary: The U.K. is expected to see borrowing cuts cut on Thursday. The cuts are expected to come from the European Union and the Bank of England.
